attr.title: MiniMetroid
attr.desc: A Metroid fan game that was made using the Pyxel engine.
attr.inst: Download at itch.io https://aged99oow.itch.io/metroid and place MiniMetroid.pyxapp into minimetroid directory
attr.inst_md: Download at [itch.io](https://aged99oow.itch.io/metroid) and place MiniMetroid.pyxapp into minimetroid directory
